translations: n.加乌乔人（居住于南美大草原上的印第安人和西班牙人的混血种族）

phrs.translation: 高乔人, 短长裤, 高卓人
罗纳尔迪尼奥, 小罗纳尔多, 罗纳尔迪尼奥·高乔, 高乔
粉金石, 威凯尔金麻

sentences.sentence: Gaucho trousers are all about the cut-off. Keep the length above the ankle but only bare a bit of the shin.
sentences.translation: 加乌乔牧人风格宽松裤是长度应保持在踝部以上，只露出一段小腿。

sentences.sentence: He ran straight into them - denim blazing with silver embroidery, serape dresses, gaucho pants with side vents of creamy silk.
sentences.translation: 他直奔风格的主题-闪耀着银色刺绣的牛仔，墨西哥披肩裙，加乌乔牧人裤侧边乳脂色丝质开衩。

sentences.sentence: It was not a tall order, as dreams go, but I might just as well have asked to be a Ninja warrior or a gaucho from the Argentine pampas.
sentences.translation: 我有自己的梦，称不上远大理想，说不定就当一名忍者武士（Ninja warrior），或者象加乌乔牧人（gaucho）驰骋阿根廷大草原也行。
